attrs.name: modelValue
attrs.desc: default color. When is empty will is transparent

attrs.name: visible
attrs.desc: Whether the setting is visible by default can also be manually modified to forcibly switch to visible to take over user actions. However, no events will be triggered

events.name: confirm
events.desc: Event triggered when the user clicks on the confirm

events.name: cancel
events.desc: Event triggered when the user clicks on the cancel
